title: Dubrovka, Kirzhachsky District, Vladimir Oblast
text:
Dubrovka () is a <a href="types%20of%20inhabited%20localities%20in%20Russia">rural locality</a> (a <a href="Village%23Russia">village</a>) in Gorkinskoye Rural Settlement, <a href="Kirzhachsky%20District">Kirzhachsky District</a>, <a href="Vladimir%20Oblast">Vladimir Oblast</a>, Russia. The population was 25 as of 2010. There are 3 streets.
Geography.
Dubrovka is located on the Sherna River, 13 km northwest of <a href="Kirzhach">Kirzhach</a> (the district's administrative centre) by road. Vasilyovo is the nearest rural locality.
